last_episode_to_air.name: This Show Was Called Squidbillies
last_episode_to_air.overview: Saying farewell to America's favorite animated family.

name: Squidbillies
overview: Squidbillies is an animated television series about the Cuylers, an impoverished family of anthropomorphic hillbilly mud squids living in the Appalachian region of Georgia's mountains. The show is produced by Williams Street Studios for the Adult Swim programming block of Cartoon Network and premiered on October 16, 2005. It is written by Dave Willis, co-creator of Aqua Teen Hunger Force, and Jim Fortier, previously of The Brak Show, both of whom worked on the Adult Swim series Space Ghost Coast to Coast. The animation is done by Awesome Incorporated, with background design by Ben Prisk.

seasons.name: Season 11
seasons.overview: America, get ready for Squidbillies season 11, where you’ll see the Cuylers solve America’s two most pressing issues, the war on Christmas and gender-neutral restrooms - plus a handful of artists cover the show’s theme song.

episodes.name: This Show Is Called Squidbillies
episodes.overview: The backstories of how the Squidbillies, America's favorite family, came to be.

episodes.name: Take This Job and Love It
episodes.overview: Early seeks employment in a difficult job market.

episodes.name: School Days, Fool Days
episodes.overview: After a debilitating sports injury, Rusty is home schooled by Early.

episodes.name: Chalky Trouble
episodes.overview: An ancient squid ceremony leads to revelations regarding Rusty's maternity.

episodes.name: Family Trouble
episodes.overview: Revelations regarding Rusty's maternity lead to questions regarding Rusty's paternity.

episodes.name: Office Politics Trouble
episodes.overview: Early concocts a popular new beverage.

episodes.name: Government Brain Voodoo Trouble
episodes.overview: Early and Sheriff reach a crossroads.

episodes.name: Butt Trouble
episodes.overview: Something strange comes out of Rusty's butt.

episodes.name: Double Truckin' the Tricky Two
episodes.overview: Early tries to out-trick the Tricky Two numbers. Results include Rusty's eye being ripped out and Granny being ripped in half.

episodes.name: Swayze Crazy
episodes.overview: Early, watching one Roadhouse too many, mistakes a legless fat man as Patrick Swayze.

episodes.name: Giant Foam Dickhat Trouble
episodes.overview: Early goes to church wearing a giant foam penis hat and tries to steal a speaker. But when the speaker falls on him, he miraculously lives through it, and swears to praise the lord in every way.

episodes.name: Meth O.D to My Madness
episodes.overview: Early buys a "hog lagoon", a range where he lets people shoot at the local porkers for a fee. But when he can't pay off Dan Halen's monthly payment of $60, he has Lil cook up some Meth.

episodes.name: The Tiniest Princess
episodes.overview: Early and Rusty are ready to go trick or treating for Halloween, but Granny's stories of a giant fire-ant man scare Rusty. Unfortunately, the legend is real, but Sherrif could prove helpful...

episodes.name: Asses to Ashes, Sluts to Dust
episodes.overview: Early looks for money to get Granny a new gallbladder.

episodes.name: Bubba Trubba
episodes.overview: Early and Rusty go to see "Plumber Bubba", a redneck plumber comedian who just might be a space alien out to suck people's brains out.

episodes.name: Burned and Reburned Again
episodes.overview: Early is desperate for Krystal's attention, so they decide to get married. Until 38 Special shows up...

episodes.name: Terminus Trouble
episodes.overview: Early, Rusty, and Sheriff head over to Atlanta to see the famous corner where Kenny stood with the Six Pack.

episodes.name: Survival of the Dumbest
episodes.overview: Rusty seeks the truth of how man came to be. However, Early, Granny, Lil, and Sheriff aren't good preachers.

episodes.name: A Sober Sunday
episodes.overview: Early attempts to find liquor on Sunday. Dan Halen creates clones to landslide Proposition 421.

episodes.name: Rebel with a Claus
episodes.overview: Early takes Santa hostage, and only a NASCAR legend can save him.

episodes.name: Webnecks
episodes.overview: Rusty discovers a world of digital wonder when he mashes buttons on a PDA given to him by the Sheriff.

episodes.name: Beast Implants
episodes.overview: Granny gets 5th degree burns all over her body and has to get new skin.

episodes.name: Tween Stream
episodes.overview: Dan Halen hires Rusty to attract pedophiles.

episodes.name: Wing Nut
episodes.overview: After seeing Early's pitiful chickens, Dan Halen sets out to create the perfect chicken.

episodes.name: Mephistopheles Traveled Below to a Southern State Whose Motto Is "Wisdom, Justice, and Moderation"
episodes.overview:
Rusty sells his soul to the devil for guitar playing skills.

Full episode name: Mephistopheles Traveled Below to a Southern State Whose Motto Is "Wisdom, Justice, & Moderation"

episodes.name: Earth Worst
episodes.overview: After giant machines terrorize the land, dirty hippies show up to stop the "earth raping machines" with their good vibes, hacky sacks, and drum circles.

episodes.name: The Good One
episodes.overview: Early gets a lifelong friend as a result of Lil's failure to use condoms.

episodes.name: Sharif
episodes.overview: Dan Halen covers the town in a cloud of "Ice Wind", his new body spray.  Meanwhile, the Sheriff takes up blogging and training for strongman competitions.

episodes.name: Condition: Demolition!
episodes.overview: Rusty discovers the joy of crashing cars, and agrees to face the "Bashitizing Smashmaster" for a chance to win an iPod.

episodes.name: The Appalachain Mud Squid: Darwin's Dilemma
episodes.overview: After the Sheriff learns from TV that the mud squid are an endangered species, he decides it's his sworn duty to protect the Cuyler family.

episodes.name: The Unbearable Heatness of Fire
episodes.overview: After the squids' house catches on fire, the Sheriff assesses the damage and investigates the fire's origin.

episodes.name: Tuscaloosa Dumpling
episodes.overview: Early teaches Rusty that life is a game and first place is sex.

episodes.name: Armageddon It On!
episodes.overview: The apocalypse comes to rural Georgia.

episodes.name: Gimmicky Magazine Show Spoof Parody About Dan Halen
episodes.overview: A news magazine interviews and profiles the achievements and scandals of Dan Halen.

episodes.name: Flight of the Deep Fried Pine Booby
episodes.overview: When Dan Halen offers a reward for the rare 'deep fried pine booby', Early goes on the hunt.

episodes.name: An Officer and a Dental Dam
episodes.overview: After Granny passes on, the only way to revive her is for Robert E. Lee to make sweet love to her.

episodes.name: The Okaleechee Dam Jam
episodes.overview: When Palooka County is forced to conserve water due to a drought, Dan Halen enacts a complicated plan to get all the water he needs.

episodes.name: Pile M for Murder
episodes.overview: Dan Halen is possessed by a demon and builds a human sacrifice theme park mountain.

episodes.name: Mud Days and Cornfused
episodes.overview: During the annual 'Mud Days' celebration, Dan Halen unleashes a strain of genetically modified corn that forces people to 'go green'.

episodes.name: Krystal, Light
episodes.overview: Early's passion for Krystal spikes after she wins the lottery.

episodes.name: Lerm
episodes.overview: After the Cuyler home ends up in an intergalactic "car wreck", Early finds a new friend in the alien, Lerm.

episodes.name: The Liar, The Bitch and the Bored Rube
episodes.overview: Books are a window to an amazing new world, and that's why they're wrong.

episodes.name: The FIne Ol' Solution
episodes.overview: Early protects menial American jobs from the Mexicans willing to do them.

episodes.name: Anabolic-holic
episodes.overview: Rusty discovers that steroids have no negative repercussions.

episodes.name: Confessions of a Gangrenous Mind
episodes.overview: Oldest living confederate widow doesn’t say anything of real relevance.

episodes.name: The Big Gay Throwdown
episodes.overview: The Sheriff goes deep undercover to apprehend his most wanted man.

episodes.name: Atone Deaf
episodes.overview: Early learns to deal with rage by punching it in the face.

episodes.name: God's Bro
episodes.overview: The Cuylers slip the surly bonds of earth and touch the face of God’s Bro.

episodes.name: Reunited, And It Feels No Good
episodes.overview: Early learns the importance of family, and profiting off them.

episodes.name: Not Without My Cash Cow!
episodes.overview: When the media sensationalizes his son’s disappearance, Early finds the coverage to be sensational.

episodes.name: Need for Weed
episodes.overview: The discovery of Lil's secret drug operation brings widespread panic to Dougal County.

episodes.name: The Many Loves of Early Cuyler
episodes.overview: Early has had sex with many different creatures. Rusty discovers that his penis is smaller than Rob Reiner's.

episodes.name: Dead Squid Walking
episodes.overview: Rusty receives a treasure map from his great-grandfather in a prison.

episodes.name: Young, Dumb and Full of Gums
episodes.overview: Dan Halen tells the citizens of Dougal Country about Obama sneaking fluoride and other mind bending drugs in to the drinking water to indoctrinate them with Socialist propaganda.

episodes.name: Holodeck Redneck
episodes.overview:
The Sheriff shows Granny, Early and Rusty the cube house of the hologram to use their imaginations.

Billie Reaves as Mammy (Granny's real mother), Jonathan Katz as the Holodeck Therapist (Uncredited)

episodes.name: Frivolacious Squidigation?
episodes.overview: Early sues Dan Halen after Granny gets hurt on one of the rides at the fair.

episodes.name: Fatal Distraction
episodes.overview:
Early's GPS unit develops a Bromance with him and tries to kill off Granny and Rusty so it and Early can be together.

Featuring Paul Stanley of Kiss as himself.

episodes.name: Clowny Freaks
episodes.overview: Rusty gets into a rap band and the fever catches Early as they both become "Clowny Freaks". Rusty eventually loses interest but not Early.

episodes.name: Lean Green Touchdown Makifying Machine
episodes.overview: Rusty discovers that he is one of the greatest football players around and this affords him a chance to go to college, but Early is against it and does all he can to stop it from happening.

episodes.name: America: Why I Love Her
episodes.overview: A very special Squidbillies musical in which Early and the rest of the group sing about how much they love the USA. First half-hour episode.

episodes.name: Asbestos I Can
episodes.overview: Early's addiction to asbestos hats gives him a terminal disease, and the Sheriff decides to let Early have his last wishes granted.

episodes.name: Class of '86
episodes.overview: The 25-year high school reunion rolls around. Dan Halen forces the Sheriff to keep Early from the party (as he dropped out in second grade), while the Sheriff begins to have flashbacks to Dan Halen's bullying.

episodes.name: Velvet Messiah
episodes.overview: Early steals granny's picture of Jesus and pretends to be him by hiding behind the picture while telling people what to do.

episodes.name: Big E
episodes.overview: Early attacks and nealy kills a radio announcer that upsets him. He ends up taking the announcers job and takes the title "Big E". He ends up losing the job when the announcer gets out of the hospital and shoots him in the face during a book signing.

episodes.name: Keeping It in the Family Way
episodes.overview: Rusty finds a girlfriend and has sex for the first time. Early, infatuated with Rusty's girlfriend, becomes upset to and tries to break them up. Rusty later finds out that he is going to be a father and comes looking for her only to find that she has run away to be with her mother. He finds her and discovers that they are cousins.

episodes.name: Snow Daddy
episodes.overview: Rusty forms a bond with a magical snowman who sheds doubt on Early's parenting skills.

episodes.name: Ballmart
episodes.overview: Sheriff hires Granny and Early as greeters in Dan Halen's new Ball Mart super store.

episodes.name: The Pharaoh's Wad
episodes.overview: Early becomes addicted to a video poker machine.

episodes.name: The Return of Gaga Pee Pap
episodes.overview: A terminally ill GaGa returns to make peace with his family before death, and "get them again" one more time.

episodes.name: Trucked Up!
episodes.overview: After being challenged on his knowledge of trucking by Rusty, Early recounts his time as The Scrambler, a rebel trucker who took on trucking runs that "couldn't be done" for Dan Halen running toxic waste from Dougal County to Paris.

episodes.name: Rusty and Tammi Sitting in a Tree, B-A-S-T-A-R-D

episodes.name: Beware the Butt-Cutter

episodes.overview: Sheriff and Rusty set out to join Early's guys-only fishin' weekend.

episodes.name: Green and Sober
episodes.overview: Lil goes to drug rehab.

episodes.name: The Legend of Kid Squid
episodes.overview: Early is jealous that Rusty is taking credit for crimes.

episodes.name: From Russia With Stud

episodes.name: Granite Caverns
episodes.overview: Early becomes king of a cave.

episodes.name: Ga-Ga-Ghost
episodes.overview: Early causes trouble with his father's ghost.

episodes.name: The Inkubator Lives!

episodes.name: Drone To The Bone
episodes.overview: Rusty gets recruited to pilot drones for the Army. Early & Granny move into a new housing development, away from the chicken crap.

episodes.name: Thou Shale Not Drill
episodes.overview: The squids debate fracture mining.

episodes.overview: Early is taken in by liberal Hollywood.

episodes.name: Gun of a Son
episodes.overview: In a plot to prove guns should be legal, Early shoots Rusty.

episodes.name: Hetero-Cephalo Agenda
episodes.overview: Early picks the wrong side in the battle for marriage equality.

episodes.name: Limbitless
episodes.overview: Early trades his legs.

episodes.name: Ink Is Thicker Than Blood, Which Is Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Rusty commits a felony offense to prove he's a good dad.

episodes.name: Bunker Down, You Hairy Dawg!
episodes.overview: Early acquires a doomsday bunker when he triggers the collapse of society.

episodes.name: A Walk To Dignity

episodes.name: Granny Hotfoot
episodes.overview: Early discovers a new way to defeat Granny.

episodes.name: Sheriff-in-law
episodes.overview: Early directs his love in the wrong places.

episodes.name: Hybrid To Hell
episodes.overview: Early loses the love of his life.

episodes.name: Jose Can You? Si!
episodes.overview: Early learns the value of a hard day's work done by someone else.

episodes.name: Lipstick on a Squid
episodes.overview: In the 10th season premiere, the Cuylers donate their bodies to science.

episodes.name: Southern Pride and Prejudice
episodes.overview: Early gets stuck in a symbol of his own oppression.

episodes.name: Trackwood Race-ist
episodes.overview: Early battles his grandson.

episodes.name: The Peep
episodes.overview: Sheriff tries stand-up comedy.

episodes.name: Vicki
episodes.overview: Sheriff's old classmate makes the mistake of returning to town.

episodes.name: Cephalo-ectomy
episodes.overview: You can take the squid out of the boy, but it's not covered by insurance.

episodes.name: Greener Pastor
episodes.overview: Scott Hilley dies.

episodes.name: Squash B'Gosh
episodes.overview: Jealousy sparks industry sparks grave robbery sparks the apocalypse.

episodes.name: Thanks-taking
episodes.overview: Rusty’s new friend gets invited to a very special Thanksgiving dinner.

episodes.name: Dove in an Iron Cage
episodes.overview: Justice is served, mayo free.

episodes.name: The Guzzle Bumpkin
episodes.overview: Grab deez nutz and Guzzle up!

episodes.name: Jacksonville Jackass
episodes.overview: Sheriff discovers alcohol at the world's largest outdoor cocktail party.

episodes.name: The Knights of the Noble Order of Mystic Turquoise Goblet
episodes.overview: Early's most confusing conspiracy theory turns out to be false.

episodes.name: The Ballad of the Latrine Marine
episodes.overview: It takes a man to make the women's room safe from men who think they're women.

episodes.name: Debased Ball
episodes.overview: Early exploits himself for attention.

episodes.overview: Everyone lies and all the houses burn.

episodes.overview: Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas!

episodes.name: Dewey Two-ey
episodes.overview: Two idiots open competing taquerias mere feet from one another.

11.name: Season 11
11.overview: America, get ready for Squidbillies season 11, where you’ll see the Cuylers solve America’s two most pressing issues, the war on Christmas and gender-neutral restrooms - plus a handful of artists cover the show’s theme song.

episodes.name: Forever Autumn
episodes.overview: Dan Halen's foolish new plan prompts Early to open a foolish new business.

episodes.overview: Granny finds love and Early loses his mind

episodes.overview: Early and Tammi start a band in a star-studded episode

episodes.overview: After finding a priceless Civil War relic, Early sells it for a reasonable price

episodes.overview: Dan Halen is disappointed to discover financial bankruptcy is not as good as moral bankruptcy

episodes.overview: A premium cooler allows Early to enjoy a new, highfalutin lifestyle

episodes.overview: Early poses as a military veteran to save 10% on an omelet.

episodes.name: Zen and the Art of Truck-Boat-Truck Maintenance
episodes.overview: Early achieves enlightenment, then shoves it down everyone else's throat.

episodes.overview: The exploits of a squid family and their interactions with the community.

episodes.name: This Show Was Called Squidbillies
